addon.description: Completely redesigned to create a modern look, while retaining the classic Aeon feel.
addon.name: Aeon Nox: SiLVO
addon.news: [I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.9.6[/COLOR][/I][CR]- xbmc.gui bump[CR]- Remove support for TV Show Next Aired and use plugin.video.themoviedb.helper[CR]- Add reboot to Android to shutdown menu[CR]- Add setting to auto hide video OSD after user chosen length of inactivity using script.skin.info.service[CR]- Remove addons not updated to work on matrix[CR]- Use script.metadata.editor instead of script.libraryeditor[CR]- Use script.xbmcbackup instead of Skin Helper Backup[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]v7.9.5[/COLOR][/I][CR]- Add music playlist contents for List view[CR]- Fix CinemaVision causing focus issue[CR]- Add Artist Slideshow 3.0 support[CR][CR][B]All updates may contain various changes and/or improvements[/B][CR]For a more complete list visit:[CR][I][COLOR FFFF9800]https://github.com/mikesilvo164/Aeon-Nox-SiLVO/commits/master[/COLOR][/I]
addon.summary: Created by BigNoid, Modded by SiLVO, and Widgets by Mr. V
